value.title: Man Recreates Childhood Friend With AI, Then It Tries to 'Murder' Him
value.excerpt: YouTuber Lucas Rizzotto said he modified a microwave with a text-based AI in an effort to build a friend that ended up being un-friendly.

value.title: Tomahawk Robotics Expands Global Coverage to Europe and Australasia Markets
value.excerpt: Tomahawk Robotics, the leading innovator of common control solutions, is proud to announce that they have expanded their offering of Kinesis software and tactical products to the global market. The rapid growth of Tomahawk Robotics' customer base both within the United States and internationally has been driven by its passion to deliver cutting-edge technology to end-users to reduce physical and cognitive burdens for warfighters and elevate the capabilities of their currently fielded unmanned systems through networking and AI.

value.title: Jack In The Box Is The Latest Restaurant Chain To Test Miso Robotics’ Kitchen Automation
value.excerpt: Miso Robotics’ kitchen robot has taken over the French fry stations across much of the White Castle system, and now Jack in the Box JACK is testing the technology. Miso today announced a partnership with the California-based chain to test its Flippy 2 and Sippy products in one of its standalone restaurants in San Diego.

value.title: Bitcoin Up Reviews: Fake or Safe Trading Robot?
value.excerpt: Nowadays, crypto trading is gaining popularity. This also implies that the market is saturated with trading platforms. It is critical to choose a platform that is safe, accurate and provides a secure method of profiting from trading in an unpredictable market.

value.title: TV Clip Study Suggest That People Prefer Voice-Only AI Companions Over Human-Like Robots
value.excerpt: In a recent study, using clips from Black Mirror, volunteers thought a voice-only AI would make a better companion than a perfect human replica. Is it the uncanny valley or just reflecting the AI companions we already know?

value.title: Leave Space Exploration To The Robots, Says New Book

value.title: GIST researchers teach robots to identify partially hidden objects

value.title: Cool or Creepy? Video Shows AI Robot Taught How to Open Doors
value.excerpt: Opening doors is a complex task for robots. Using a deep learning approach, researchers taught one to open a door with a 96.8% success rate.

value.title: Designing a soft robot to improve lung examinations

value.title: Turnbull’s AI robotics bet taps investors for blockbuster raising
value.excerpt: AI robotics innovator Advanced Navigation has had no trouble finding its path to market. The company, which counts former Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull as a director, is tapping investors this month to raise between $80 million and $135 million and is expected to have no trouble getting the raise away.

value.title: Hospital Robots Are Helping Combat a Wave of Nurse Burnout

value.title: AI Ethics And The Acclaimed AI Uncanny Valley, Which Also Rattles AI-Based Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: AI ethics has a love-hate relationship with the famous or infamous uncanny valley, which can be particularly explored via the advent of AI-based self-driving cars.

value.title: Team Uses AI and Robotics to Treat Spinal Cord Injuries
value.excerpt: A team of researchers at Rutgers University has employed artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics to formulate therapeutic proteins. The team was able to successfully stabilize an enzyme that can degrade scar tissues resulting from spinal cord injuries.

value.title: Local robotics team finishes competition season with stellar showing
value.excerpt: The Titanium Titans robotics team, which offers STEM competition and community to Washington County youth, recently finished its tenth season with a stellar showing at two regional competitions.
